# Product Assets Guide

This folder contains all product images organized by category and subcategory.

## Directory Structure

```
assets/
├── appliances/
│   ├── refrigerator/          (Add refrigerator images here)
│   └── air-conditioner/       (Add AC images here)
├── mobiles/
│   ├── apple/                 (Add Apple phone images)
│   ├── vivo/                  (Add Vivo phone images)
│   ├── oppo/                  (Add Oppo phone images)
│   ├── realme/                (Add Realme phone images)
│   ├── oneplus/               (Add OnePlus phone images)
│   └── motorola/              (Add Motorola phone images)
├── electronics/
│   ├── home-theater/          (Add home theater images)
│   └── sound-bar/             (Add sound bar images)
├── tv/
│   ├── toshiba/               (Add Toshiba TV images)
│   ├── mi/                    (Add Mi TV images)
│   ├── realme/                (Add Realme TV images)
│   ├── samsung/               (Add Samsung TV images)
│   ├── lg/                    (Add LG TV images)
│   ├── assembled-tv/          (Add Assembled TV images)
│   └── tcl/                   (Add TCL TV images)
└── trending/
    ├── best-sellers/          (Add best seller product images)
    └── new-arrivals/          (Add new arrival product images)
```

## How to Add Product Images

1. Navigate to the appropriate category and subcategory folder
2. Add your product images (PNG, JPG, WebP formats recommended)
3. Name images descriptively (e.g., `product-1.jpg`, `refrigerator-model-x.jpg`)
4. Update the products database to reference these images

## Image Naming Convention

- Use lowercase names
- Use hyphens instead of spaces
- Include product type in name
- Examples:
  - `apple-iphone-13.jpg`
  - `samsung-55-inch-qled.jpg`
  - `lg-home-theater-5.1.jpg`

## Recommended Image Specifications

- Format: JPG, PNG, or WebP
- Size: 400x400px to 600x600px (square format preferred)
- File size: 100KB - 500KB per image
- Quality: 85-95% for JPG
